name: Startup Folder File Write
description: A General detection for files being created in the Windows startup directory. This could be an indicator of persistence.
false_positives: An FP could be caused by legitimate application writing shortcuts for example. This folder should always be inspected to make sure that all the files in there are legitimate
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.path:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Start\ Menu\\Programs\\StartUp* AND (NOT (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\wuauclt.exe)))`
